topic.title: Using the with a WebDAV Server

body.p: includes a WebDAV plugin that enables you to access files stored on a WebDAV-enabled server. To access these files, it is assumed that the WebDAV plugin is enabled in your installation of .

To open a file stored on a WebDAV-enabled server, use the dedicated WebDAV Open Action button in the Open file section of the main dashboard. If your connection has not yet been configured, a Configure WebDAV dialog box will be displayed that allows you to select the URL for the connection.
